original_text: Them also king David dedicated unto the Lord, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 그것도 여호와께 드리되 에돔과 모압과 암몬 자손과 블레셋 사람들과 아말렉 등 모든 이방 민족에게서 빼앗아 온 은금과 함께 하여 드리니라

sentences.original_text: Them also king David dedicated unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕은 그것들을 또한 주께 바쳤다

sentences.original_text: with the silver and the gold that he brought
and from the children of Ammon
